definitions.definition: The former name, from 1914 (when Russia entered World War I ) to 1924 (when Lenin died), of Saint Petersburg , a major city in Russia .
A region of Saint Petersburg city, Saint Petersburg , Northwest Russia district, European Russia , Russia .

main_definition: ( historical ) The former name, from 1914 (when Russia entered World War I ) to 1924 (when Lenin died), of Saint Petersburg , a major city in Russia .
secondary_definitions: A region of Saint Petersburg city, Saint Petersburg , Northwest Russia district, European Russia , Russia .
